name: Red Colony
storyline:
Maria is the CEO of LAB, a high-tech laboratory on the Red Colony. LAB has been doing some pretty weird and revolutionary experiments under their new head scientist Dr J.

Dr J is fascinated with genome splicing and insists to Maria that his experiments are both safe and ethical. Due to outsider pressure and the willingness for the Red Colony to do anything to be their rivals the Blue Colony, Maria agrees to let Dr J continues his experiments, pretty much unchecked. What could possibly go wrong, right?

A few weeks later, Maria awakens in a dark and damp warehouse with no knowledge of how she got there. All she knows is that there are flesh eating Zombies clawing at the walls and Dr J has something to do with their appearance.

The Doctor will have to wait though. Maria needs to first save her family and have them escorted from the Colony. Then when they are safe, she can uncover the mystery behind the terrifying Zombies.
summary: Red Colony is a 2D Horror Game filled with drama, mystery, zombies and gore. Help Maria find her daughter and get revenge on her cheating Husband, whilst uncovering the truths of the origins of the virus.
